title: 26. Real Talk: How Big Are Your Dreams?
itunes:title: 26. Real Talk: How Big Are Your Dreams?
description: Most people have it wrong ... when you make other people uncomfortable with your goals, you should take that as a COMPLIMENT.  You see, most people these days just want to be complacent, and when you tell them about your goals, they feel insecure because they selfishly don't want to be passed up. On today's show, Andy tells you how to deal with these type of people, and how to continue moving forward.
